data.comment: The match has started, with Khimki kicking-off.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
In the minute 2, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin blows against Rubin Kazan's Georgi Zotov for offside.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Mohamed Konate for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Khimki in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Free kick Khimki.
In the minute 14, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan attack but Silvije Begic's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Rubin Kazan have a dangerous throw-in.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Khimki are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Arena Khimki.
Kirill Bozhenov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Khimki.
In the minute 22, In Khimki Khimki drive forward through Mohamed Konate. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a throw-in for Khimki, close to Rubin Kazan's area.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Khimki's half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Khimki.
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 27, Rubin Kazan drive upfield and Filip Uremovic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Khimki defender.
Free kick Khimki.
Rubin Kazan's Silvije Begic has been booked in Khimki.
In the minute 28, Dmitri Tikhiy for Khimki drives towards goal at Arena Khimki. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
Hwang In-beom (Rubin Kazan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Khimki.
Rubin Kazan are pushing forward but Hwang In-beom's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Khimki.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
Throw-in for Khimki close to the penalty box.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 39, In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 40, Aleksandr Filin (Khimki) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 41, At Arena Khimki, Mohamed Konate has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Arena Khimki.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
The first half has been concluded at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Khimki - Rubin Kazan with the kick-off.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 46, In Khimki Rubin Kazan attack through Ivan Ignatyev. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
The home team have replaced Dmitri Tikhiy with Vladimir Dyadyun. This is the first substitution made today by Igor Cherevchenko.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Khimki.
In the minute 48, Khimki have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Reziuan Mirzov puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (Rubin Kazan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 53, Georgi Zotov (Rubin Kazan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Khimki.
In the minute 54, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Khimki throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
Leonid Slutskiy (Rubin Kazan) is making a first substitution, with Denis Makarov replacing Soltmurad Bakaev.
Free kick for Khimki in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Khimki's Denis Glushakov gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aleksandr Troshechkin (Khimki) has received a yellow card from Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 60, Rubin Kazan push forward at Arena Khimki and Oliver Abildgaard gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Khimki defence.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 62, Khimki to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 63, Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
Rubin Kazan pushes forward through Denis Makarov, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 66, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Khimki a goal kick.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Khimki just outside Rubin Kazan's area.
Filip Uremovic for Rubin Kazan has been booked by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 69, Reziuan Mirzov of Khimki gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
Goal! Denis Glushakov extends Khimki's lead to 2-0.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
In the minute 70, Kirill Kosarev is replacing Ivan Ignatyev for Rubin Kazan at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Arena Khimki.
Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
In the minute 74, Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Igor Cherevchenko is making the team's second substitution at Arena Khimki with Arshak Koryan replacing Mohamed Konate.
In the minute 75, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the home team a throw-in.
Vladimir Dyadyun for Khimki is whistled offside.
Khimki's Denis Glushakov gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Khimki.
Ilya Kukharchuk (Khimki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Khimki's half.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Arshak Koryan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Khimki.
In the minute 81, Rubin Kazan's Khvicha Kvaratskhelia misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
Reziuan Mirzov (Khimki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 82, Rubin Kazan needs to be cautious. Khimki have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Khimki.
Aleksandr Zuev is replacing Georgi Zotov for Rubin Kazan at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 84, Khimki surge into the attack at Arena Khimki but Aleksandr Troshechkinâ€™s header is off-target.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Kirill Kosarev of Rubin Kazan is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Khimki in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Igor Cherevchenko is making the team's third substitution at Arena Khimki with Kamran Aliev replacing Reziuan Mirzov.
Khimki make their fourth substitution with Pavel Mogilevets replacing Aleksandr Troshechkin.
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
In the minute 89, Rubin Kazan have a dangerous throw-in.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Filip Uremovic (Rubin Kazan) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
At Arena Khimki the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Filip Uremovic (Rubin Kazan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Rubin Kazan push forward at Arena Khimki and Kirill Kosarev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Khimki defence.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In Khimki, Silvije Begic (Rubin Kazan) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Ilya Lantratov for Khimki has been booked by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin and receives a first yellow card.
Igor Cherevchenko (Khimki) is making a fifth substitution, with Islambek Kuat replacing Denis Glushakov.
